The government's aim is to make Greece a multiple energy hub and a pole of peace and stability.
The work of the TAP pipeline, which will transport natural gas from the Caspian region to Europe, is evolving rapidly. 1/3
The upgrading of one of the country's most crucial energy infrastructure, LNG LNG terminal, is advancing. 2/3
But also the construction of the Floating Unit for the Storage and Re-gasification of Liquefied Natural Gas in Alexandroupolis. 3/3
At the same time, we are working intensively, at diplomatic level, to mature strategic energy projects. 1/2
The East Med gas pipeline, the interconnector pipeline between Greece and Bulgaria, the Euroasia Interconnector. 2/2
We pay particular attention to RES. in order to improve the country's energy mix. Investments in excess of 1 billion are in progress.
We create the appropriate institutional framework to enable citizens or new 'energy communities' to produce energy.
The "save" program, to be launched by the end of the summer, concerns private and public buildings as well as the transport sector
The interconnection of the islands and the new framework for RES are setting the preconditions for the zeroing of Y.K.O.

For our part, we have taken a series of interventions to strengthen the regional industry.
We have a forward absorption of the NSRF, which reached 11.4% against 7% of the target. Significantly increased Prog. Public Investment.
Three billion will be marketed through the Entrepreneurship, Co-Investment, Microfinance and Pre- "I save home".
Today, incentives are provided for businesses, such as a stable 12-year tax regime, tax cuts and aids.
The efforts are attributable to: the turnover index in industry, in March 2017, increased by 24,5% compared to March 2016
Exports experienced a 6.3% recovery in the same month and posted a positive recruitment / retirement balance to the private sector.
At the same time, the North Helladic arc is transformed into a construction site with very important infrastructure and investment projects for the wider region.
